trans-unit.source: !IMPORTANT These analyzers do not perform any kind of telemetry. The same analyzers get used by your IDE when you get a CSXXXX diagnostic.
trans-unit.target: !IMPORTANT These analyzers do not perform any kind of telemetry. The same analyzers get used by your IDE when you get a CSXXXX diagnostic.

trans-unit.source: They analyze the code for possible issues in your project with the Stride.Core design. To avoid unexpected runtime/compile time/editor time behaviour these analyzers try to warn as soon as possible for issues that may occur. Each of the following pages contain information about diagnostic codes that can be reported by the Roslyn analyzers, which are built into Stride.Core.CompilerServices.
trans-unit.target: They analyze the code for possible issues in your project with the Stride.Core design. To avoid unexpected runtime/compile time/editor time behaviour these analyzers try to warn as soon as possible for issues that may occur. Each of the following pages contain information about diagnostic codes that can be reported by the Roslyn analyzers, which are built into Stride.Core.CompilerServices.

trans-unit.source: An explanation why it is necessary to report the diagnostic
trans-unit.target: An explanation why it is necessary to report the diagnostic

trans-unit.source: Examples when such a diagnostics occurs
trans-unit.target: Examples when such a diagnostics occurs

trans-unit.source: Information about how to resolve the diagnostic
trans-unit.target: Information about how to resolve the diagnostic

trans-unit.source: If an error is reported it is possible to click in the IDE on the diagnostic code in the information box about the diagnostic. This will open the corresponding information page about the diagnostic.
trans-unit.target: If an error is reported it is possible to click in the IDE on the diagnostic code in the information box about the diagnostic. This will open the corresponding information page about the diagnostic.

trans-unit.source: The Stride.Core.CompilerServices is linked to Stride.Core, the diagnostic Analysis will only occur if your project references Stride.Core in the PackageReferences, this will automatically add the Stride.Core.CompilerServices to your project.
trans-unit.target: The Stride.Core.CompilerServices is linked to Stride.Core, the diagnostic Analysis will only occur if your project references Stride.Core in the PackageReferences, this will automatically add the Stride.Core.CompilerServices to your project.

trans-unit.source: !WARNING Note that diagnostic feature is experimental and may not work as expected. Warnings may contain solutions that don't work yet.
trans-unit.target: !WARNING Note that diagnostic feature is experimental and may not work as expected. Warnings may contain solutions that don't work yet.
